name: Tufftatella Canyon
description:
Introduction

A very short and rugged Superstition Mountains canyon.

Approach

Follow light used trail to drop.

Descent

R1: 105' large bush and boulders set back from the edge.

Downclimb to First Water Creek.

Exit

Follow Nikon Draw exit back up to road, or reverse downclimb Nikon Draw for more adventure.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

First record of descent by Melissa Gibbons, Jacob Cowan, and Erek Burek on Oct 29, 2023.
